## Mixed Model

```{r }
Full.Model <- lme(data = FullData, Scale.Forest ~ CassavaIntensity + ClovesIntensity + CocoaIntensity + CoffeeIntensity + MaizeIntensity + RiceIntensity + SweetPotatoIntensity + VanillaIntensity + Scale.Pop, 
                   random = ~1|Year)
summary(Full.Model)
rsquared(Full.Model)

TempTest.mixed <- lme(data = NTL.summertemp,
                     temperature_C ~ year4, 
                     random = ~1|lakename)
summary(TempTest.mixed)
rsquared(TempTest.mixed)

```
